param.name: industry
param.label: Industry Name
param.description: Name of industry where jobs are posted

param.name: admingroup
param.label: Admin Group
param.description: Name of a HUB group to have unrestricted access to job postings and resumes, in addition to Joomla site administrators

param.name: specialgroup
param.label: Special Services Group
param.description: Name of a HUB group to have access to restricted-level subscriptions (usually above Premium)

param.name: autoapprove
param.label: Auto approve job postings
param.description: Auto approve job postings from employer with a valid subscription

param.name: defaultsort
param.label: By default sort jobs by...
param.description: Default sorting of jobs by either category or type

param.name: jobslimit
param.label: Limit jobs per page
param.description: Specify how many jobs to show on one page by default

param.name: allowsubscriptions
param.label: Allow user subscriptions?
param.description: Allow users to subscribe to employer services and post jobs and browse resumes.

param.name: usonly
param.label: US jobs only?
param.description: Allow to post only US-based jobs

param.name: infolink
param.label: URL to about page
param.description: URL to page explaining the job search process

param.name: premium_infolink
param.label: URL to premium services page
param.description: URL to page explaining the premium services
